text: Ma khros chunga han Khrista'n ratha roijêkpungei le rachamneipungei2:15: Khrista'n ratha roijêkpungei le rachamneipungei sinthotheina renga ama nanâkin jôkpaiin; aninônchuKhrista hah rathatienga roijêkpungei le rachamneipungei an sinthotheina a lâkpai pe ngei zoi. sinthotheina renga ama nanâkin jôkpaiin; ma a menênangei hah mitin mu rangin a minlang zoi ani.
